sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>go</radical> radical and the <kanji>go</kanji> kanji are exactly the same!
meaningInfo: If you know your radicals well enough (and you do), you'll know this kanji.
readingMnemonic: "<kanji>Go</kanji>!" someone is telling you. "Go! Go! Go!" That person is <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>. He is holding his finger out, and pointing at your WaniKani reviews. "Go! Go!" Then, he over-enunciates the word "go" by saying "<reading>GYOU!</reading>!" (<ja>ぎょう</ja>).
readingInfo: You try to go another direction, and he just yells and points louder: "GO!"
